marklogic.body:
I sincerely hope they do stop the pensions for Bertie and the rest of these cronies, however this is ireland and i know very well that the government will talk about it for a year or so and then come up with a lame excuse that it can't be done.
I'd also love to see these guys have their bank accounts frozen and assets stripped by the revenue and sent to prison like the criminals that they are, but i doubt that will happen either, the reason being that all of politicians in this country are the same and theres no way they are gonna light a fire on something that could Burn them too in the future.
Having said that if enda did manage to pull this Off he might just regain a little of the respect that he has lost over the past year from the electorate.
